thread.title: Life | Dublin's newest desert is pure chocolate-y goodness and we need it in our faces
thread.title_full: Life | Dublin's newest desert is pure chocolate-y goodness and we need it in our faces - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Dublin's newest desert is pure chocolate-y goodness and we need it in our faces
text:
Dylan McGrath's Fade St. Social has a new desert on the menu, and words just won't do it justice.
Thankfully, we have a video, so we don't need words, which is handy seeing as we're too busy salivating to talk.
Just look at this thing.
Described as a "Chocolate Sphere melted with Hot Chocolate and Mandarin sauce with caramelised Chocolate ice cream centred with Lemon pur√©e and broken Chocolate Crumble", we're not sure what half of that means but we want it, we want it badly.
Via Fade Street Social Facebook
